ui.app.httpsDescription: 没有HTTPS情况下，机密数据将会未加密传输。
ui.app.configSecurity1: SECURITY ALERT !!! Unprotected config directory detected
ui.app.configSecurity2:
The Contao Manager has detected that its config files are publicly accessible. All operations are disabled until the directory is secured, otherwise an attacker could access sensitive data of your installation.

To fix this issue, make sure to prevent access to the "contao-manager" directory on your server. To learn how to do this, please refer to the manual of your webserver or contact your hosting provider.
ui.account.intro:
Welcome to the Contao Manager, a universal tool to install and manage Contao 4 Open Source CMS. If you are new to it, please read the manual to get started.

If you encouter any problems, check our GitHub issues and feel free to create new one for anything that has not been reported yet.
ui.account.headline: 用户账户
ui.account.description: 为了管理安装，请为Contao管理器创建一个账号。请注意该账号和Contao后台和前端没有关联。
ui.account.passwortDifferent: 密码和确认密码不匹配。
ui.account.contribute:
Contao 和 Contao 管理器由非盈利的Contao协会赞助。
请考虑 成为开源贡献者。
ui.login.headline: 登录
ui.oauth.error: 无效的OAuth尝试。检查请求参数。
ui.oauth.headline: OAuth认证
ui.oauth.description: 以下应用程序或者服务正在请求对您的Contao Manager实例远程访问。
ui.boot.headline: 系统检查
ui.boot.description: 请稍等，我们正在分析服务器 …
ui.boot.issue2: 在使用Contao管理器之前必须修复安装中出现的问题。
ui.recovery.headline: System Recovery
ui.recovery.description: The Contao Manager detected files that look like Contao, but the Command Line Interface does not work as expected. Please choose an option to repair your installation.
ui.recovery.repairDescription: Attempts to automatically repair the installation by rebuilding the application cache and re-installing the Composer packages.
ui.recovery.repairWarning: Any modifications to the vendor files might be deleted in the process!
ui.recovery.repairFailed: Automatic repair was not successful. Try the Safe Mode to manually repair the installation.
ui.recovery.safeModeDescription: Launching the Contao Manager in Safe Mode allows to manage packages and run certain maintenance tasks, but features that rely on a working Contao installation will not be available.
ui.server.error: 由于意外的服务器响应，检查失败。
ui.server.prerequisite: 由于缺少必要的条件，检查已取消。
ui.server.selfUpdate.title: Contao管理器更新
ui.server.selfUpdate.dev: 开发版不支持自动更新。
ui.server.config.title: 服务器配置
ui.server.config.description:
To correctly run background tasks, Contao Manager needs to know where to find the PHP command line binary and how to run commands separated from the web process.

Most server will be detected automatically. If your hosting provider is not listed, feel free to add the necessary details to your wiki.
ui.server.config.formText: 选择与服务器或者主机提供商匹配的配置。自定义配置，请选择"其他 …"。
ui.server.config.customText: 请输入PHP二进制文件位置。确认二进制文件和服务器web进程是相同的PHP版本。
ui.server.config.cloudText: The Composer Cloud Resolver allows to install Composer dependencies even if your server does not provide enough local memory. Please be aware that your package information will be transmitted to a cloud server operated by the Contao Association.
ui.server.config.phpDetected: 服务器未知，但自动监测到一个有效的PHP路径。
ui.server.config.stateErrorCli: 服务器中没有发现有效的PHP二进制文件。
ui.server.config.stateErrorCloud: The Composer Cloud Resolver is not supported.
ui.server.config.stateCustom: 自定义配置, PHP 二进制文件位于 {php_cli}.
ui.server.config.stateSuccess: 配置为 {server}, PHP 二进制文件位于 {php_cli}.
ui.server.php_web.title: PHP Web 进程
ui.server.php_web.below7: 发现 PHP 版本 {version}。请尽快切换到PHP 7!
ui.server.php_web.success: 发现PHP版本 {version}, 没有发现已知问题。
ui.server.php_cli.title: PHP命令行接口
ui.server.php_cli.success: 发现PHP版本 {version}, 没有发现已知问题。
ui.server.composer.title: Composer环境
ui.server.contao.title: Contao 安装
ui.server.contao.old: Contao版本 {version}不兼容Contao Manager，请手动更新当前安装的系统。
ui.server.contao.headline: Contao安装
ui.server.contao.description: 欢迎来到Contao Open Source CMS安装流程。可选择在2个版本间安装。
ui.server.contao.ltsText: LTS版本将会延长支持长达四年。
ui.server.contao.latestText: A new latest version is released every six months in February and August.
ui.server.contao.releaseplan: 查看 Contao 发布计划 以获取详细信息。
ui.taskpopup.failedHeadline: Contao管理器启动控制台任务失败！
ui.taskpopup.failedDescription:
在后台尝试运行任务时发生错误。
如果再次发生，有可能是服务器不支持。
ui.taskpopup.confirmCancel: Are you sure to cancel this task? This might leave your Contao installation in an broken state!
ui.maintenance.rebuildCache.title: 应用缓存
ui.maintenance.rebuildCache.description: 修改任何配置文件后，必须重建应用程序缓存。
ui.maintenance.dumpAutoload.title: Composer类加载器
ui.maintenance.dumpAutoload.description: Composer autoloader负责PHP类加载。添加自定义命名空间到根composer.json后必须打印autoloader。
ui.maintenance.composerInstall.title: Composer依赖
ui.maintenance.composerInstall.descripti: Composer依赖关系位于应用程序根目录中的 /vendor 文件夹中。 在操作或手动上传 composer.lock 文件后重新安装依赖关系是必要的。
ui.maintenance.composerCache.title: Composer缓存
ui.maintenance.composerCache.description: Composer缓存下载的软件包以提高性能。 如果您遇到文件损坏等问题，请尝试删除Composer缓存以强制进行新的下载。
ui.maintenance.debugMode.title: 调试模式
ui.maintenance.debugMode.description: 通过设置app_dev.php入口点的用户和密码来激活调试模式。
ui.maintenance.debugMode.user: 请输入用于调试模式的用户名。
ui.maintenance.debugMode.password: 请输入用于调试模式的密码。
ui.maintenance.opcodeCache.title: Opcode缓存
ui.maintenance.opcodeCache.description: Opcode在Web进程上缓存PHP文件以加快执行速度。 如果文件在更改后无法识别，则在某些情况下必须将其删除。
ui.packages.changesMessage: You have {total} unconfirmed change. ::: You have {total} unconfirmed changes.
ui.package.hintConstraint: 应用更改时，此包将会带约束 {constraint} 安装。
ui.package.hintConstraintBest: 应用更改时，此包将会安装最佳版本。
ui.package.hintConstraintChange: 应用更改时，此包的约束将从"{from}"更改为"{to}"。
ui.package.hintConstraintUpdate: This package will be updated when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintRemoved: 应用更改时，该程序包将被移除。
ui.package.requiredText: This package is required in your composer.json but not installed.
ui.package.incompatibleText: Contao 4 版本不支持该程序包
ui.package.replacement: 该程序包标记为抛弃，请用 "{replacement}" 替代.
ui.package.support_issues: 问题 / 错误 报告
ui.package.proprietaryText: Please visit the website for more information.
ui.package.additionalDownloads: {count} 下载 :::  共 {count} 次下载
ui.package.additionalStars: {count} 星星 ::: 共 {count} 颗星星
ui.packagesearch.offlineExplain: 检查网络连接并在浏览器中禁用JavaScript拦截器。
ui.packagesearch.searching: 正在搜索匹配{query} 的 Contao 程序包 …
